text: @WHO @WHOWPRO @WHOSEARO @WHO_Europe @pahowho @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO @WHO I think people should call coronavirus something different because coronavirus is a type of virus but this one confuses the internet if I search it up like if I wanta learn about the type I only find this one instead of the type

entity.name: The WHO is holding an emergency meeting on the new coronavirus
entity.description: According to the announcement, the World Health Organization's Emergency Committee "will ascertain whether the outbreak constitutes a public health emergency of international concern" and provide recommendations on how to manage the situation.

entity.name: 'Too early' to declare coronavirus outbreak as global health emergency, says WHO
entity.description: The World Health Organization declined for a second day to declare the pneumonia-like coronavirus a global health emergency. China confirmed that the death toll has reached 41 and that 1000 people have been infected.
